recipesJson.name: Pear Candy
recipesJson.author: NOVITEC
recipesJson.description: A smooth, juicy pear candy.  Remember as a kid eating Pez candies?  Imagine a handful of Pez textured candy mixed with the ripest, juiciest pear picked straight from the most bountiful pear tree all whipped together is a refreshing, candy textured eliquid.  A great all day vape for you fruit/candy lovers.
